languages.text: {n}Таддуа устремляет на вас взгляд фанатика.{/n} "Один из них, даже будучи приближенным к верхам Тассеры, попрал традиции и устои нашего мира, отказавшись менять свою судьбу. Второй же, будучи из ничтожеств, копошащихся в грязи, изменил свою участь".

traits.locale_text: "Я проведу допрос, Вольный Торговец. Продолжай, палач. Состав преступления обвиняемых — начиная с Ронды".

languages.text: {n}Taddua fixes you with a fanatical stare.{/n} "One of them, despite being one of the highest lords of Thassera, spat on our world's customs by refusing to alter his destiny. The other did change his fate, even though he was just a lowborn wallowing in the mud."
languages.original_text: {n}Таддуа устремляет на вас взгляд фанатика.{/n} "Один из них, даже будучи приближенным к верхам Тассеры, попрал традиции и устои нашего мира, отказавшись менять свою судьбу. Второй же, будучи из ничтожеств, копошащихся в грязи, изменил свою участь".

traits.locale_text: {n}Ursus fixes you with a fanatical stare.{/n} "One of them, even though he was close to the top lords of Thassera, rejected the greatest gift and responsibility by refusing to change his fate. The other did alter his destiny despite being a lowlife writing in the mud."

{n}Ursus fixes you with a fanatical stare.{/n} "One of them, even though he was close to the top lords of Thassera, rejected the greatest gift and responsibility by refusing to change his fate. The other did alter his destiny despite being a lowlife writing in the mud."

{n}Taddua fixes you with a fanatical stare.{/n} "One of them, despite being one of the highest lords of Thassera, spat on our world's customs by refusing to alter his destiny. The other did change his fate, even though he was just a lowborn wallowing in the mud."

{n}Taddua fixes you with a fanatical stare.{/n} "One of them, despite being one of the highest lords of Thassera, spat on our world's customs by refusing to alter his destiny. The other did change his fate, even though he was just a lowborn wallowing in the mud."

languages.text: {n}塔杜亚以狂热的目光盯着你。{/n}“其中一个人原本是塔瑟拉最高阶的领主之一，但他却唾弃这个世界的习俗，拒绝改变自己的命运。至于另一个人，尽管他只是个在泥坑里打滚的下等人，但确确实实地改变了命运。”
languages.original_text: {n}Taddua fixes you with a fanatical stare.{/n} "One of them, despite being one of the highest lords of Thassera, spat on our world's customs by refusing to alter his destiny. The other did change his fate, even though he was just a lowborn wallowing in the mud."

traits.locale_text: {n}塔杜亚以狂热的目光盯着你。{/n}“其中一个人原本是塔瑟拉最高阶的领主之一，但他却唾弃这个世界的习俗，拒绝改变自己的命运。至于另一个人，尽管他只是个在泥坑里打滚的下等人，但确确实实地改变了命运。”
{n}乌苏斯以狂热的目光盯着你。{/n}“其中一个人原本是塔瑟拉最高阶的领主之一，但他却唾弃这个世界的习俗，拒绝改变自己的命运。至于另一个人，尽管他只是个在泥坑里打滚的下等人，但确确实实地改变了命运。”

languages.text: {n}Taddua clava en ti una mirada de fanatismo.{/n} «Uno de ellos, a pesar de contarse entre los más ilustres nobles de Thassera, escupió en las costumbres de nuestro mundo negándose a cambiar su destino. El otro sí lo cambió, aun a pesar de ser un plebeyo mugriento sin oficio ni beneficio».
languages.original_text: {n}Taddua fixes you with a fanatical stare.{/n} "One of them, despite being one of the highest lords of Thassera, spat on our world's customs by refusing to alter his destiny. The other did change his fate, even though he was just a lowborn wallowing in the mud."

traits.locale_text: {n}Taddua clava en ti una mirada de fanatismo.{/n} «Uno de ellos, a pesar de contarse entre los más ilustres nobles de Thassera, escupió en las costumbres de nuestro mundo negándose a cambiar su destino. El otro sí lo cambió, aun a pesar de ser un plebeyo mugriento sin oficio ni beneficio».

{n}Ursus clava en ti una mirada de fanatismo.{/n} «Uno de ellos, a pesar de contarse entre los más ilustres nobles de Thassera, escupió en las costumbres de nuestro mundo negándose a cambiar su destino. El otro sí lo cambió, aun a pesar de ser un plebeyo mugriento sin oficio ni beneficio».

languages.text: {n}Taddua, fanatik bir bakışla sana kilitleniyor.{/n} "Biri, Thassera'nın en yüksek lordlarından biri olmasına rağmen kaderini değiştirmeyi reddederek dünyamızın geleneklerine yüz çevirdi. Diğeri ise çamurda debelenen aşağı tabakadan biri olmasına rağmen kaderini değiştirdi."
languages.original_text: {n}Taddua fixes you with a fanatical stare.{/n} "One of them, despite being one of the highest lords of Thassera, spat on our world's customs by refusing to alter his destiny. The other did change his fate, even though he was just a lowborn wallowing in the mud."

traits.locale_text: {n}Taddua, fanatik bir bakışla sana kilitleniyor.{/n} "Biri, Thassera'nın en yüksek lordlarından biri olmasına rağmen kaderini değiştirmeyi reddederek dünyamızın geleneklerine yüz çevirdi. Diğeri ise çamurda debelenen aşağı tabakadan biri olmasına rağmen kaderini değiştirdi."

{n}Ursus, fanatik bir bakışla sana kilitleniyor.{/n} "Biri, Thassera'nın en yüksek lordlarından biri olmasına rağmen kaderini değiştirmeyi reddederek dünyamızın geleneklerine yüz çevirdi. Diğeri ise çamurda debelenen aşağı tabakadan biri olmasına rağmen kaderini değiştirdi."

languages.text: {n}タッドゥアは、熱狂的な様子であなたを見つめる。{/n}「彼らの一人は、タッセーラの最も高い身分の貴族の一人ですが、運命を変えることを拒否したために我々の惑星の慣習に唾棄しました。もう一人は、泥の中で溺れていた低い生まれの者に過ぎなかったのですが、運命を変えたためです」
languages.original_text: {n}Taddua fixes you with a fanatical stare.{/n} "One of them, despite being one of the highest lords of Thassera, spat on our world's customs by refusing to alter his destiny. The other did change his fate, even though he was just a lowborn wallowing in the mud."

traits.locale_text: {n}アーサスは、熱狂的な様子であなたを見つめる。{/n}「彼らの一人は、タッセーラの最も高い身分の貴族の一人ですが、運命を変えることを拒否したために我々の惑星の慣習に唾棄しました。もう一人は、泥の中で溺れていた低い生まれの者に過ぎなかったのですが、運命を変えたためです」
{n}アーサスは、熱狂的な様子であなたを見つめる。{/n}「彼らの一人は、タッセーラの最も高い身分の貴族の一人ですが、運命を変えることを拒否したために我々の惑星の慣習に唾棄しました。もう一人は、泥の中で溺れていた低い生まれの者に過ぎなかったのですが、運命を変えたためです」

languages.text: {n}Taddua vous fixe de son regard illuminé.{/n} « L'un d'entre eux, en dépit de sa qualité de haut seigneur de Thassera, a craché sur les coutumes de notre monde en refusant d'infléchir sa destinée, tandis que l'autre l'a fait, même s'il n'était qu'un gueux tout droit sorti du caniveau le plus sordide. »
languages.original_text: {n}Taddua fixes you with a fanatical stare.{/n} "One of them, despite being one of the highest lords of Thassera, spat on our world's customs by refusing to alter his destiny. The other did change his fate, even though he was just a lowborn wallowing in the mud."

traits.locale_text: {n}Taddua vous fixe de son regard illuminé.{/n} « L'un d'entre eux, en dépit de sa qualité de haut seigneur de Thassera, a craché sur les coutumes de notre monde en refusant d'infléchir sa destinée, tandis que l'autre l'a fait, même s'il n'était qu'un gueux tout droit sorti du caniveau le plus sordide. »

{n}Ursus vous fixe de son regard illuminé.{/n} « L'un d'entre eux, en dépit de sa qualité de haut seigneur de Thassera, a craché sur les coutumes de notre monde en refusant d'infléchir sa destinée, tandis que l'autre l'a fait, même s'il n'était qu'un gueux tout droit sorti du caniveau le plus sordide. »

languages.text: {n}Taddua fixiert dich mit einem fanatischen Blick.{/n} "Einer von ihnen ist zwar einer der höchsten Herren von Thassera, hat aber auf die Bräuche unserer Welt gespuckt, indem er sich weigerte, sein Schicksal zu verändern. Der andere hat sein Schicksal verändert, obwohl er nur ein Niedergeborener war, der im Schlamm lebte."
languages.original_text: {n}Taddua fixes you with a fanatical stare.{/n} "One of them, despite being one of the highest lords of Thassera, spat on our world's customs by refusing to alter his destiny. The other did change his fate, even though he was just a lowborn wallowing in the mud."

Der andere hat sein Schicksal verändert, obwohl er nur ein Niedergeborener war, der im Schlamm lebte."
